entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Bug] Incorrect SupportedOSPlatform attribute? #2235
  • Workload installation failed: Workload not found: microsoft-android-sdk-full. Known workloads: android android-aot ios maccatalyst macos maui maui-mobile maui-desktop maui-core maui-android maui-maccatalyst maui-ios maui-windows tvos microsoft-net-sdk-emscripten wasm-tools microsoft-net-runtime-android microsoft-net-runtime-android-aot microsoft-net-runtime-ios runtimes-ios microsoft-net-runtime-maccatalyst runtimes-maccatalyst microsoft-net-runtime-macos microsoft-net-runtime-tvos runtimes-tvos microsoft-net-runtime-mono-tooling #2232
  • [Bug] Fix the VS templates #2230
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • CarouselView Do Not Work [Bug] #2225

Closed

  • [Bug] Cannot dynamically add control to an existing StackLayout with Windows. #1985
  • [Bug] Elements in Grid not moved when calling SetRow or SetColumn #2120
    partner, partner/ui-tools, 6.0.100-rc.1
  • [Bug] ScrollToAsync appears to go the wrong direction for the supplied Enum #2214
  • Error: The file 'iOS/Resources/LaunchScreen.xib' conflicts with 'iOS/Resources/LaunchScreen.xib'. #2222
  • Error CS0579: Duplicate 'global::Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Xaml.XamlFilePath' attribute #2221
  • Type XXX already defines a member called 'InitializeComponent' with the same parameter types #2220
  • [Bug] Labels with dynamic text do not update. #2060

Updated

  • Linking errors when running a maui app on physical iOS device referencing nuget packages #2179
  • [Enhancement] Is there a Windows project example of Maui? #2146
  • Switch's Text #1709
    t/enhancement ☀️
  • [Bug] No templates found matching: 'maui' #1804
  • [Bug] BackgroundColor is not applied if changed using a binding or in code at runtime #1854
    t/bug
  • Button not rendered correctly #1941
    t/bug
  • [Bug] DatePicker not working as expected in Android #1940
    t/bug
  • Label's Shadow #1994
  • Image’s Animation #2017
    t/enhancement ☀️
  • Window11 cannot debug WinUI project in MAUI template [Bug] #2104
    s/question ?
  • Wrong Answer in FAQ #2134
  • [Bug] HttpClient crashes on Android #1260
  • [Bug] RadioButtonGroup properties not working in new .NET MAUI Layout (Worked with Preview 6) #2040
  • [Bug] [Android] Grid does not size correctly until a few moments after initial render #1992
    partner/cat 😻
  • [Bug] The application crashes if a Frame is placed inside another one on the main page #2119
  • [Bug] Dynamically changing FlexLayout Direction from code-behind does not re-layout UI #2155
  • [Bug] Updating Image Properties through Code-Behind does not reflect in UI. #2153
    partner, partner/ui-tools
  • [Bug] Setting ScrollbarVisibility in ScrollView is not working #2202
  • [Bug] Label placed inside Frame does not render correctly, appears squished. #1508
    partner/ui-tools, 6.0.100-rc.1

PullRequests

Created

  • Factory spike #2239
  • PartialAppManifest is now a real feature #2238
  • Implement IVisualTreeElement for TableView #2237
  • [main] Update dependencies from xamarin/xamarin-macios #2236
  • [build] fix local 'dotnet cake' builds #2234
  • Add exception handling for GatherXmlnsDefinitionAttributes Assembly Loading #2229
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • [main] Update dependencies from xamarin/xamarin-android #2227

Merged

  • Call disconnect on shimmed NavPage Handler and fix image loading code that was running on the task pool #2160
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • [VisualDiagnostics] Replace Element with IVisualTreeElement #2231
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • Only run all device tests on DevDiv #2233
  • IPropertyMapper needs a setter/adder #2228
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • Make sure that Invalidate is called when items move between rows/columns #2224
  • Convert Controls ScrollTo element request to position request before sending to handler #2219
  • [main] Update dependencies from xamarin/xamarin-macios #2216

Updated

  • WIP: MAUI AppBuilder / DI changes #2137
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • AbsoluteLayout #2136
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • Implement FlowDirection property in ViewHandlers #948
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • Include CornerRadius and Border everywhere #650
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • Make Application.Properties obsolete and fix implementation #2158
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • Update to WindowsAppSdk 1.0.0-experimental #2047
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • Implement WebView2 async request handling with deferral #2055
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • remove TypeConversionAttribute #2210
  • Shadow Support #570
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • Android/iOS Button ImageSource #2079
    t/breaking 💥, 6.0.100-rc.1
  • ContentView CSharp Item Template #2065
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • ContentView XAML Item Template #2064
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • ContentPage CSharp Item Template #2063
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • [Handler]Collectionview handler for iOS #2156
  • Update SkiaSharp and add pdb files #2195
    6.0.100-rc.1
